tika-vin11t36:11_1: Athāyamācariyo attano viracite vinaye tassupanissaye vinayapiṭake ca bhikkhūnaṁ nānappakārakosallajananatthaṁ
tika-vin11t36:11_2: parivāraṭṭhakathāyañca āgatavinicchayaṁ saṅgahetvā uttarapakaraṇaṁ vaṇṇayitukāmo paṭhamaṁ tāva antarāyanivāraṇena
tika-vin11t36:12_0: Pakaraṇārambhe ratanattayavandanāpayojanaṁ tattha tatthācariyehi bahudhā papañcitaṁ,
tika-vin11t36:12_1: amhehi ca vinayavinicchayavaṇṇanāyaṁ samāsato dassitanti na taṁ idha vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-vin11t36:12_2: Pakaraṇābhidheyya karaṇappakārapayojanānipi tattha dassitanayānusārena idhāpi veditabbāni.
tika-vin11t36:13_2: gaṇañca vanditvā uttaraṁ dāni karissāmīti sambandho.
tika-vin11t36:13_5: Tattha sabbasattuttamanti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu sattā āsattā visattā laggitāti sattā,
tika-vin11t36:13_6: paramatthato sattapaññattiyā upādānabhūtā upādānakkhandhā vohārato khandhasantatiṁ upādāya paññattā sammuti ‘‘sattā’’ti vuccanti.
tika-vin11t36:13_10: Tesu khīṇāsavānaṁ yathāvuttanibbacanatthena sattavohāro na labbhati.
tika-vin11t36:13_11: Tathāpi te bhūtapubbagatiyā vā taṁsadisattā vā ‘‘sattā’’ti vuccanti.
tika-vin11t36:13_12: Sabbe ca te sattā cā ti sabbasattā.
tika-vin11t36:13_17: sabbasattesu vā uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti sabbasattuttamo.
tika-vin11t36:14_3: Tādibhāvena indakhīlasineruādayo viya aṭṭhalokadhammasaṅkhātena bhusavātena akampiyaṭṭhena,
tika-vin11t36:14_4: catuvesārajjavasena sadevake loke kenaci akampanīyaṭṭhena ca dhīraṁ,
tika-vin11t36:15_5: ubhayapaṇāmehi nānantariyakatāya manopaṇāmopi dassito ca hoti.
tika-vin11t36:17_1: Adhammaviddhaṁsanti dhammasaṅkhātassa kusalassa paṭipakkhattā adhammo vuccati akusaladhammo,
tika-vin11t36:17_2: taṁ akusalasaṅkhātaṁ adhammaṁ viddhaṁseti vināseti pajahati tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇappahānenāti adhammaviddhaṁso,
tika-vin11t36:17_4: Pariyatti hi pañcannaṁ pahānānaṁ mūlakāraṇattā phalūpacārena tathā vuccati,
tika-vin11t36:18_2: Aṅgaṇanāsananti attano nissayaṁ aṅganti matthentīti aṅgaṇā,
tika-vin11t36:18_4: te aṅgaṇe nāseti yathāyogaṁ tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedapaṭippassaddhinissaraṇappahānehi pajahatīti aṅgaṇanāsano, taṁ.
tika-vin11t36:19_1: Mayā vinayassa yo sāro vinicchayo racito,
tika-vin11t36:19_5: sabbesaṁ vā vinicchayānaṁ anuttaro uttamo vinicchayoti sabbānuttaro, taṁ.
tika-vin11t36:20_10: Atha vā buddhassa vinicchaye kataparicayattā paññavato janassa buddhivaḍḍhanaṁ buddhiyā paññāya tikkhavisadabhāvāpādanena bhiyyobhāvasādhakaṁ.
tika-vin11t36:20_11: Paramaṁ uttamaṁ uttaraṁ nāma pakaraṇaṁ vadato kathentassa me mama santikā niratā vinicchaye,
tika-vin11t36:20_12: tīsu sikkhāsu vā visesena ratā nibodhatha jānātha sutamayañāṇaṁ abhinipphādethāti sotujanaṁ savane niyojeti.
